overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by permanent establishment or physical presence of more than 183 days.
overview.currency_exchange_rules: No restrictions on currency conversion, but banks may charge fees.

personal_income_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, with potential for foreign tax credit
personal_income_tax.exemptions: Standard deduction of 55,000 KGS per year
personal_income_tax.social_security: 12% of salary (shared between employer and employee)

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: No special rate for small businesses.
corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, with potential for foreign tax credit
corporate_tax.deductions: Expenses incurred in the production of income, including depreciation.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt up to 10 million KGS.

vat_gst.exemptions: Certain agricultural products, healthcare, and education.

property_tax.rate: 0.1% of assessed value for residential properties, 0.2% for commercial properties.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Must have a valid passport, proof of income, and a business or employment contract.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Digital nomads may be eligible for a flat tax rate of 10% on their income.
digital_nomad_visa.duration: Up to 1 year, renewable for an additional year.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.mining_tax: Treated as business income and taxed at the corporate tax rate.

additional_notes.political_risks: Political instability may impact tax policies.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Currency fluctuations and economic instability may affect tax calculations.
additional_notes.legal_system: Tax disputes may face delays due to an underdeveloped legal system.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 70th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
